dialogue: Good! Now you need to locate the database in order to get the data we need.
Well, that’s all from me. Don’t let me down, [color=hackerman]{name}[/color].
I’ve never hacked into a hospital before but it shouldn’t be too different to the other jobs I’ve taken.
Let's see, I can use [color=hint]W,A,S,D keys to move around[/color].
